Package net.sf.jstuff.integration.serviceregistry

Interface ServiceProxy<SERVICE_INTERFACE>

All Known Subinterfaces:
ServiceProxyInternal<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultServiceProxyAdvice
public interface ServiceProxy<SERVICE_INTERFACE>
Interface implemented by the service instances handed out to services consumers. Service consumers can cast the received service reference to this type to access service meta-data provided by the service registry.
Author:
Sebastian Thomschke
